articles.author: BBC News
articles.description:
Police appeal for information relating to three babies abandoned by the same parents shortly after birth in east London.

A reward of £20,000 is also being offered by Crimestoppers.
articles.title: £20,000 reward offered as police search for parents of three abandoned babies

articles.title: Iran: Two supreme court judges shot dead in Tehran
